title: Drawing, "Elevation of wall with three niches", 1780
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and green watercolor, brush and gray wash, traces of graphite on white laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Elevation of wall with three niches, top moldings decorated with shells and garlands. Brackets flanking center niche show a covered vase at left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Elevation of wall with three niches", 1780.
1780. Pen and black ink, brush and green watercolor, brush and gray wash, traces of graphite on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1948-40-149.
